Innovations within reach: Clearing the air on
virtualization
Skill Level: Introductory

front.div:
Virtualization is a hot topic in enterprise computing today. However, the term
"virtualization" can take on many different meanings, each offering distinct
advantages to the enterprise. This article looks at two prevalent flavors of
virtualization --server virtualization and application virtualization --and the benefits
that each of these types can provide.
Each installment of Innovations within reach features new information and
discussions on topics related to emerging technologies, from both developer and
practitioner standpoints, plus behind-the-scenes looks at leading edge IBM®
WebSphere® products.
